page.title: 07HOMES
page.content: A survey carried out by the pupils of class 3J of Crynallt Junior school established that , out of the 34 children in the class : 19 live in a semi-detached houses, 5 live in detached houses, 4 live in terraced houses, 3 live in detached bungalows, one lives in a flat, one lives in a public house and one lives on a farm.Here is an account of the most common type of home, written by Mark, aged 10: "My house is in Glannant Way, Cimla. It has 7 rooms and 8 windows. The rooms are, 3 bedrooms, one bathroom, a living room, a dining room and a kitchen. The exterior walls of my house are made of brick, rendered with pebble-dashing. There are aluminium window and door frames.
